headline: Waters Holds Jefferies Buy Rating Despite Target Cut, with BD Merger Poised to Boost Long-Term Growth
summary: Waters Corporation (NYSE:WAT) is one of the best agriculture technology stocks to buy now. On August 4, 2025, Jefferies analyst Tycho Peterson reiterated a Buy rating on Waters while trimming the price target from $435 to $385. The revision wasn’t a knock on the company’s strength, it was a tempered recalibration after a 12% post-merger […]

headline: Waters Corp (WAT) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Sales Growth and Raised Guidance
summary: Waters Corp (WAT) reports robust Q2 performance with 9% sales growth and raises full-year guidance, despite challenges in certain segments.
